ygData.subject: Re: Range Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... By the way, I have heard rumors of a magical throwing weapon which returns to you after it s thrown (i.e. it doesn t use ammo and never gets used up).  But
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:
> On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, Su-chan wrote:
> >
> > I would like to get a good range weapon, but I don't know which or where
> > find it. It is very annoying when de mob runs away when nit is close to
> > death.
>
> Unfortunately, there is not much you can do. Nearly all
> ranged weapons except bows do pathetic damage, and we can't
> use bows. You will just have to chase it until you get Bellow
> at L12, and Chain at L23.

By the way, I have heard rumors of a magical throwing weapon
which returns to you after it's thrown (i.e. it doesn't use
ammo and never gets used up). But I haven't seen anything
like it on any spoiler site anywhere.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
